    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the ComboBoxes on the Update Appointment window with the different options from the database.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to the fxml file.
      resourceBundle - The resources supplied for the UpdateApptController.

    • onActionupdateApptSaveBtn

      public void onActionupdateApptSaveBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      A method that handles an update appointment save button. Checks to make sure the appointment start time is before the end time, and checks for any appointment overlap before saving the appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The specified ActionEvent.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Throws SQL exception if data could not be saved into the database.
      IOException - Throws IO exception if there is an issue loading the specified FXML file.

    • onActionUpdateApptCancelBtn

      public void onActionUpdateApptCancelBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method closes the current window and loads the ApptCustOverView fxml.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event of the cancel button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If unable to locate or open the ApptCustOverView fxml.

    • onActionUpdateApptLocationComBx

      public void onActionUpdateApptLocationComBx(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

    • receiveApptData

      public void receiveApptData(Appointments updateAppt, int selectedIndex) throws SQLException
      This method is used to set the appointment fields of the appointment object from the database to the corresponding fields of the update appointment window.
      Parameters:
      updateAppt - The current appointment object pulled from the database.
      selectedIndex - The index of the appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If unable to select the data from the database.
